articles.title: Two suspects charged after death of 51 migrants in sweltering Texas truck
articles.description: The deceased migrants, 39 men and 12 women, were discovered on Monday on the outskirts of San Antonio, Texas, in one of the deadliest human trafficking tragedies in recent history.

articles.title: Turkey greenlights Sweden, Finland's NATO bid, internal conflicts remain
articles.description: Rounds of talks have been held in the past weeks at both Ankara and NATO headquarters in Brussels which aimed to resolve differences among the two Nordic states and Turkey.
